name: XmasSpinFunPro
description:
XmasSpinFunPro App details:

Have fun with " XmasSpinFunPro ",
a slot machine type game.
Made especially for younger kids.

Just touch the "SPIN" button and try
to line up 3 of the same pictures,
across, LH diagonally or RH diagonally.

If you do, you WIN!

See how many times you can win.

Features:
auto scoring,
plays spin sounds and
wining bells with applause.

A fun game for kids of all ages.

Enjoy!

This Game is 100% native code.
Network connection NOT required.

No computer player.
It is no fun when the computer always wins!

Another fun game from the
"Parker Engineering Company"
